title: Why did the Nazis hate gay people? - Quora

response.answer_text: People speculate, but the Nazis explained it themselves, while the rampant homosexuality among the upper levels of the Brown Shirts sickened Hitler, and most of the SS, and there was venom there, the real driver to punish homosexuality was the Nazi desire for the Aryan population to increase, while homosexuality obviously doesn’t help with procreation.

Not jst the Nazi’s but world wide at the time noone accepted them as regular people. in Russia it was the same as well as most of Asia. In North America it was dangerous to be outwardly gay. The Nazis however did throw gay in woth gypsies, Jews amd mentally infirm.
